BusinessObjectInterface.description: Interface Name for Business Object Prg0AbsPlan

Library.description: Service for Program Management related operations on Active workspace client
Library.name: Pgp0SoaPrgPlanningAw

Library.description: Library for Active Workspace Program Planning Infra module
Library.name: pgp0awprgplanning

ParameterInfo.description: The source Prg0AbsPlan object to copy the events from.
A list of Prg0AbsEvent objects to copy to the target Prg0AbsPlan. This list will be used if the sourcePlan is not provided.
The target Prg0AbsPlan object to copy the events to.
The date used to offset the copied Prg0AbsEvent objects. If the value is null or empty, it will be ignored.

Map of proprties defined in deep copy rules to be overridden.
If the value is true the related objects will be copied, otherwise they will be not be copied.
If true, the operation will be performed in background mode in a separate asynchronous server session; otherwise, perform the operation synchronously.

Operation.description: This operation copies the Prg0AbsEvent objects from the source Prg0AbsPlan object to the target Prg0AbsPlan object. The copied Prg0AbsEvent plan date will be offset based on the prime event date.
Operation.name: copyEvents
Operation.returnDescription:
The modified Prg0AbsPlan objects in the updated objects list of ServiceData.
The list of copied Prg0AbsEvent objects in the created list of ServiceData.

The following errors may be returned: -

179004: Source Plan Events were not copied because you do not have permission to 1 or more of the events.

ParameterInfo.description: The source Prg0AbsPlan object to copy the events from.
A list of Prg0AbsEvent objects to copy to the target Prg0AbsPlan. This list will be used if the sourcePlan is not provided.
The target Prg0AbsPlan object to copy the events to.
The date used to offset the copied Prg0AbsEvent objects. If the value is null or empty, it will be ignored.

Map of proprties defined in deep copy rules to be overridden.
If the value is true the related objects will be copied, otherwise they will be not be copied.

Operation.description: This async operation copies the Prg0AbsEvent objects from the source Prg0AbsPlan object to the target Prg0AbsPlan object. The copied Prg0AbsEvent plan date will be offset based on the prime event date.
Operation.name: copyEventsAsync
Operation.returnDescription: There are no specific business errors returned.Notification will be sent in case of failure.

ParameterInfo.description: The context plan object to load. The object type can be Prg0ProgramPlan, Prg0ProjectPlan or Prg0SubProjectPlan object.
The reference Prg0AbsPlan object starting from which, the plan hierarchy is to be traversed to load the remaining plan objects.

Operation.description: The service operation loads the plan hierarchy which may contain Prg0ProgramPlan, Prg0ProjectPlan or Prg0SubProjectPlan and the associated Prg0AbsEvent objects based on the given context and reference plan objects.
Operation.name: loadPlanHierarchy
Operation.returnDescription:
Returns an ordered list of Prg0AbsPlan objects and their associated Prg0AbsEvent objects based on the given context Prg0AbsPlan object and the reference Prg0AbsPlan object. The returned plan objects can be of type Prg0ProgramPlan, Prg0ProjectPlan and Prg0SubProjectPlan.
Also returns a flag to indicate whether there are more Prg0AbsPlan objects in the hierarchy which are yet to be loaded.
The following errors may be returned-
    • 179001: An internal error has occurred in the Active Workspace Program Management module. This is returned if an unexpected error occurs while trying to fetch the Plan hierarchy and events from the database.
    • 179002: The context object is not a valid type to paginate the plan hierarchy. Valid types are Program, Project and Subproject.
    • 179003: The reference object is not a valid type to paginate the plan hierarchy. Valid types are Program, Project and Subproject.

ParameterInfo.description: The plan level object opened or selected in timeline sublocation.
True if selected plan level object is valid for showing the command.

Operation.description: This operation validates whether the selected object on timeline sublocation is valid for showing add event object command.
Operation.name: pgp0CanAddEventObject

ParameterInfo.description: The plan level object opened or selected in timeline sublocation.
True if selected plan level object is valid for showing the command.

Operation.description: This operation validates whether the selected object on timeline sublocation is valid for showing add plan level object command.
Operation.name: pgp0CanAddPlanLevelObject

ParameterInfo.description: The event object selected in timeline sublocation.
True if selected event object is valid for showing the command.

Operation.description: This operation validates whether the selected event object on timeline sublocation is valid for showing delete event object command.
Operation.name: pgp0CanDeleteEventObject

Operation.name: pgp0IsContentSecurityEnabled

Typedef.description:
Map (string, bool) of properties defined in the deep copy rules for Prg0AbsEvent which needs to be overridden.
If the value is true the related objects will be copied, otherwise they will be not be copied.
Typedef.name: OverrideRelationPropMap
